subject: p14387068
History: Evaluation of the patient with cirrhosis, empyema pneumonia, currently short of breath.
Findings: Portable AP radiograph of the chest was compared to and. Since, there is interval progression of extensive consolidation involving almost the entire left lung, consistent with worsening pneumonia. Since the radiograph obtained a day ago no appreciable change is demonstrated. Most likely the patients pleural effusion was tapped on the right with currently decreased amount of right pleural effusion and presence of loculated basal pneumothorax. Pigtail catheter is in place.
